original_text: It will be very bad for Ariel, the city where David lived. Continue to have your usual feasts every year, but trouble will come!
korean_text: 슬프다 아리엘이여 아리엘이여 다윗이 진 친 성읍이여 해마다 절기가 돌아오려니와

sentences.original_text: It will be very bad for Ariel,
sentences.korean_translation: 아리엘에게는 매우 나쁜 일이 닥칠 것이며,

sentences.original_text: Continue to have your usual feasts every year,
